abstract: In a letter to the billionaire investor, Clorox wrote that his offer still undervalued the company and lacked firm details about its financing and closing conditions.
snippet: In a letter to the billionaire investor, Clorox wrote that his offer still undervalued the company and lacked firm details about its financing and closing conditions.
lead_paragraph: Clorox said on Tuesday that its board had rejected a revised $10.7 billion takeover bid by Carl C. Icahn, saying that the offer remained inadequate.

headline.main: Clorox Rejects Icahn’s Revised Takeover Bid

byline.original: By Michael J. de la Merced
